missions.projects: Project New product site: Java and adobe AEM/CQ developer on the « New Product Site », the new Nissan website. Migration from adobe CQ4 and flash technologies to AEM and Html5. www.nissan.co.uk (8 people)
missions.description: Lead developer on 'new product site'. Made the architecture ready for continuous delivery and pushed it to the whole JAVA pole. Plp implementation in ajax with elastic-search. Developed multiple API and libraries to facilitate development on AEM. Delivered 3 websites based on AEM as lead developer
missions.technical: JAVA 7, IntelliJ, Subversion, CQ5, jsp, maven, Elastic-search, JQuery + UI, Ext-JS, Ajax, poi, HttpClient, Spring

missions.projects: Sedre web, car electric schema consultation website aimed at mechanics
missions.description: Ensure browser compatibility and implement new functionality on Sedre Web, a web site for electric schema visualization (SVG). Development of Sedre management, the backoffice used to administrate schemas metadata
